content.value: On July 3, 2021, the Blankets for T.O. team helped out at Member of Parliament Shaun Chen’s Canada Day event, where 1,000 giveaway bags were distributed to local residents. Days prior to the event, we helped to package the giveaway bags which included items like medical face masks, disinfecting wipes, a t-shirt, a bottle of hand sanitizer, a toy, various food items, and Canada Day merchandise. Our team assisted in transporting the bags to the site at the parking lot of Woodside Square and set up the area for the drive-thru event. The Blankets for T.O. team had lots of fun helping to direct traffic and handing out the giveaway bags to attendees!

title.en-US: Blankets for T.O. at MP Shaun Chen's Canada Day Weekend Giveaway Drive-Thru

description.en-US: Members of the Blankets for T.O. team with MP Shaun Chen, during his Canada Day Weekend Giveaway Drive-Thru on July 3rd, 2021.

content.value: Despite the long hours of preparation and being outside in the hot weather, it was undoubtedly a humbling experience for us and all the other helpers. We were able to celebrate Canada Day together and connect with the community while supporting them during these tough times.

This event was my first volunteer experience which involved such a large number of people. Putting a smile on everyone’s face was extremely worthwhile and helped to reinforce my sense of purpose. I can certainly say that this event has stimulated my enthusiasm to participate in future community-driven initiatives, no matter how big or small my contribution may be.
Mei Ling, Director of Finance at Blankets for T.O.

At Blankets for T.O., we are always grateful for opportunities to help out the community in any way that we can. A big thank you to MP Shaun Chen and his team for organizing this great event and to everyone who showed up!
